explanation: [0-0] Against a grayish-white background, a group of sika deer stand on a cliff edge on the left, a gray bridge with gray spikes is in the middle, a cliff is on the right, green plants cover both cliffs, two green trees are on the side, and the artistic white English subtitle "Rifana art and craft" is at the bottom.

[0-3] First, the large sika deer turns its head to the left, then jumps off the cliff and lands on the spikes of the bridge. The large sika deer is injured by the spikes and bleeds bright red blood, its eyes are closed and a tear rolls down.

A cheetah appears on the edge of the cliff on the left, with its two front paws on the edge of the cliff, looking down at the large sika deer on the bridge with its teeth bared. Three small sika deer on the right are shedding tears and lying on the edge of the cliff. The cheetah on the left exits to the left.
